full_summary:
# Tender Notice for Uplands Improvements in Comfort Cove
## Reference Number and Solicitation Number
The reference number for this tender notice is **CB-7961-56999165**, and the solicitation number is **30004613**.

## Project Overview
This project involves the provision of works and services for upland improvements at Comfort Cove, Newfoundland and Labrador. The successful contractor will be responsible for furnishing all necessary plant, labour, equipment, and materials for the project.

## Work Scope
The work under this contract includes, but is not limited to, the following:
- Supply and installation of new granulars, asphalt, and concrete slab on grade.
- Completion of the work within 12 weeks after contract award date.

## Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact:
- Name: Paul Fortier
- Email: [paul.fortier@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:paul.fortier@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
- Phone: (343) 596-9926

## Tender Details
- Closing date: September 1, 2023 at 14:00 ET
- Attachment: 
    - [Addendum-Addenda No. 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7961/pr30004613_addendum-addenda-no.-1.pdf)
    - [Request for Qualification-Services-Two-Phase-Uplands-Improvements-Comfort-Cove-NL](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7961/30004613-request-for-qualification---services---two-phase---uplands-improvements-comfort-cove-nl---en.pdf)
